testInfo.name: Тест по Future Perfect Continuous
testInfo.description: Тест на будущее совершенное продолженное время

questions.question: Choose the correct form: By next month, I ___ here for five years.
What is the structure of Future Perfect Continuous?
Fill in the blank: By 2025, we ___ (live) in this house for 10 years.
When do we use Future Perfect Continuous?
options: For duration up to a point in future
questions.correctAnswer: For duration up to a point in future

questions.question: Fill in the blank: How long ___ you ___ (study) English by next year?
Which emphasizes duration before a point in future?
Fill in the blank: By the time she arrives, I ___ (wait) for two hours.
What is the question form for 'they will have been working'?
Fill in the blank: Next year, I ___ (teach) at this school for 15 years.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: By 5 PM, I will have been driving for 8 hours.
By 5 PM, I will have driven for 8 hours.
By 5 PM, I will be driving for 8 hours.
By 5 PM, I will drive for 8 hours.
questions.correctAnswer: By 5 PM, I will have been driving for 8 hours.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: They ___ (not work) here long by December.
Which time expression is typical?
options: for + period of time + by + point
questions.correctAnswer: for + period of time + by + point

questions.question: Fill in the blank: By tomorrow, it ___ (rain) for three days.
What is the negative form of 'I will have been studying'?
options: I will not have been studying.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: ___ you ___ (work) here for 10 years by 2030?
